rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev041301_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Nimu about Prone folklore.

rows.label: tev041301_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev041301_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Nimu if he's heard any interesting rumors.

rows.label: tev041301_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Nimu if he's heard any interesting rumors.

rows.label: tev041301_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Nimu about recent developments.

rows.label: tev041301_SEL1011
rows.name: Ask Nimu about Prone folklore.

rows.label: tev041301_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Nimu about recent developments.

rows.label: tev041301_SEL2021
rows.name: Ask Nimu about recent developments.

rows.label: tev041301_MSG0001
rows.name:
In time of chaos, Cataclysm Bird will appear in sky.
Lead multitude to land of beginnings and ends.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev041301_MSG0002
rows.name: Tree Clan has told this legend for 10,000 suns.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev041301_MSG0003
rows.name:
This legend seems to have come true.
It foretold our coming here![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev041301_MSG0004
rows.name: But then what is beginning? And what is end?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev041301_MSG0005
rows.name: Maybe Mira has destiny in store for us...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev041301_MSG0006
rows.name:
But many bad things may still happen.
We must remain watchful.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev041301_MSG0101
rows.name: One of our female Prone likes you Earth aliens.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev041301_MSG0102
rows.name:
Some lament this choice. I do not.
We should look on your kind with favor![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev041301_MSG0103
rows.name: Times change. So must we.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev041301_MSG0104
rows.name:
Hmm? Where is female Prone now?
I think she was seen in industrial district.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev041301_MSG0201
rows.name:
I heard about BLADE operative who seeks to learn
about Cavern Clan.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev041301_MSG0202
rows.name:
This BLADE is said to be mighty.
What is BLADE planning with brutes of Cavern Clan?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev041301_MSG0203
rows.name:
Cavern Clan is nothing like aliens on ship.
You should stay away.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev041301_MSG0301
rows.name: You allowed Cavern Clan inside city![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev041301_MSG0304
rows.name:
...It is your city. You can do as you will.
But we are not pleased.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev041301_MSG0305
rows.name: Cavern Clan may be what triggers great cataclysm...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev041301_MSG1001
rows.name:
Great cataclysm has been averted.
We no longer fear old legend.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev041301_MSG1002
rows.name: I will find new legend now. It will be my calling![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev041301_MSG1003
rows.name:
I will follow epic saga of Earth aliens and all who
make homes on this ship![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev041301_MSG1008
rows.name: We must not let others suffer Oche's fate.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev041301_MSG1009
rows.name:
I will sing of this sad war to young Prone.
I will make certain they remember.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev041301_MSG1010
rows.name:
Maybe Tree Clan and Cavern Clan will join one day.
Maybe they forget their anger. I hope it is so.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev041301_MSG2001
rows.name:
We have new bond with Slovity Pagus.
We could ask for no greater victory.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev041301_MSG2002
rows.name:
Now we try to join Tree Clan and Cavern Clan.
We must seize chance to reunite Prone![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev041301_MSG2003
rows.name:
Thank you, Earth alien. You inspire us.
You give all races fair chance.[ST:wait ]
